Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-65637 affecting package moby-compose for versions less than 2.17.3-13
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-65637 affecting package moby-compose for versions less than 2.17.3-13. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package moby-compose is earlier than 2.17.3-13, affected by CVE-2025-65637
